{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Nuk Sauger Nipple is a type of nipple used for feeding babies. According to Document [17], NUK is a German baby-products company that developed an asymmetrically shaped teat for feeding and calming babies. The shape of the NUK teat is based on the anatomy of the child's palate, which suggests that it is designed to mimic the natural breastfeeding experience. Therefore, it can be considered a physiologic nipple.", "answer_choice": "C. Physiologic nipple."}
